data.body:
knowledge & skills

  • Design, build and maintain Web Application in PHP/JAVA.
  • Integrating website with CMS framework.
  • Test and resolve bug issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design and ship new features.
  • Discuss with Product Managers and highlight concern with current design and propose better solutions.
  • Perform proper unit testing before committing code.
  • Managing codes in version control repository such as Git
  • Liaise with QA to ensure features and bugs are properly tested.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

benefits

  • Flexible working hours
  • Direct hands-on experience engagement

本港新冠肺炎疫情持續

  • 本港新冠肺炎疫情持續。衞生署衞生防護中心傳染病處
  • 衞生署衞生防護中心傳染病處主任張竹君
  • 今日(10日)新增2992確診
  • 包括219輸入個案
  • 昨日(9日)再多兩名患者離世
  • 死者分別70歲和85歲
  • 均在院舍居住
